attributes.action: Close Motor Dealerships to protect employees during the Pandemic
attributes.background:
The Dealerships won’t close as they are worries about their profits but the staff are at risk! Please instruct them
To close ! The Virus is getting worse so they must close to protect employees!

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced the closure of all non-essential retailers, which includes car showrooms: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close-guidance

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
